file_content.text: All right, you got me...
...but if I'm going down, you're going down with me! Haha!
To the end!
Hah! One-handed, even! One real hand, anyway....
Cannon fodder!
Boy, that one's a gusher! Hah!
Oh, you done it now!
You just asked for a whole new brand of whupping!
Been a blast, but it's over now!
This is the part where you finally die!
Oh-ho!
Nice try!
Aye! Now this is a fight!
Why've you got to ruin a perfectly good plan? Just die!
Your heads will make fine trophies! Haha!
I don't think so!
Let's see some blood!
Aw, what? Hurt your feelings? Got you all sad inside?
The Ravagers are mine again, that's all that matters! You're nothing more than cannon fodder!
It's like the Ravagers always say: "Why leave 'em alive when you can kill 'em?"
Hah! Like I'd really cut you people in anyway! But, hey, thanks for distracting Cora long enough for me to gain the upper hand! Haha!
I warned you not to cross me, Cora!
Didn't think you'd hear from me so soon, did you? Wanted you to meet my new business partners! They're on their way right now! Haha!
You need to hop over to Coratanni's ship! Got to make sure that backstabber doesn't get away!
Okay, plan's coming together. Get at the heart of that tub and I'll do the rest.
You're in time for Bulo's weekly booze delivery to Raider's Cove. He'd enslave his own family to keep his shipments on schedule!
Love to see the look on his ugly mug when he sees you coming, that scum. Deserves whatever he's about to get.
Ruugar! You miserable, flea-loving wretch!
